snippet.title: Worse Things Happen at Sea Walkthrough, ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
A walkthrough of the ZX Spectrum game, Worse Things Happen at Sea. A 1984 game from Silversoft Ltd. Help the C-Droid make the ship have a successful crossing by, amongst other things, patching leaks, correcting the ship's course and protecting as much cargo as possible from being spoilt. This video shows four successful crossings being made. From the recording originally sent by WhatHoSnorkers to http://www.rzxarchive.co.uk/ . 

#ZXSpectrum #RetroGaming #Walkthrough
